critique: The document is a formal announcement regarding the deferral of certain sections of an Executive Order. It concerns the effective dates of provisions related to vocational education, agricultural programs, and the abolishment of the Federal Employment Stabilization Board. Since there is not enough information to portray any emotion, a score of 1 will be given to all emotions.The initial scores are all 1.
